subject: p10523725
Findings: PA and lateral upright chest radiographs were reviewed with comparison to. Post-sternotomy wires are stable. Tortuous aorta is re-demonstrated. Heart size and mediastinum are unchanged. Pleural thickening at the right costophrenic angle is noted. No new abnormalities as compared to prior examinations seen.
